title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: 2021 AlpenCoin Gold Plated Bar #082https://mempool.space/address/19myqR9VEuwX29QASJnCqxhQY6ZZTs9uxF**Comes with display box**STARTING BID: 0.0150BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0003BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 17th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT:BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: I wonder that if there is any tracker/database etc. for the Alpen bars/coins to check with?I ask so for pure curiosity's sake only.Goldlyre

comments.author: goldlyre
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 01:26:35 AMQuote from: goldlyre on December 12, 2023, 12:38:54 AMI wonder that if there is any tracker/database etc. for the Alpen bars/coins to check with?I ask so for pure curiosity's sake only.Goldlyrehttps://www.alpencoin.ch/en/public-keyThank you very much, man. It helps a lot.

comments.body: 0.015 BTCI bid for myself this time.

comments.author: frankbitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 06:06:47 AMQuote from: frankbitcoin on December 12, 2023, 06:00:26 AMQuote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 01:26:35 AMQuote from: goldlyre on December 12, 2023, 12:38:54 AMI wonder that if there is any tracker/database etc. for the Alpen bars/coins to check with?I ask so for pure curiosity's sake only.Goldlyrehttps://www.alpencoin.ch/en/public-keyWeird, that link does not pull up mine when I type in the serialDid you type in the serial case specific?Yep, letter and three digit number.  (Also, sorry, not attempting to hijack the thread)

comments.author: frankbitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 06:24:18 AMQuote from: frankbitcoin on December 12, 2023, 06:11:43 AMQuote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 06:06:47 AMQuote from: frankbitcoin on December 12, 2023, 06:00:26 AMQuote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 01:26:35 AMQuote from: goldlyre on December 12, 2023, 12:38:54 AMI wonder that if there is any tracker/database etc. for the Alpen bars/coins to check with?I ask so for pure curiosity's sake only.Goldlyrehttps://www.alpencoin.ch/en/public-keyWeird, that link does not pull up mine when I type in the serialDid you type in the serial case specific?Yep, letter and three digit number.  (Also, sorry, not attempting to hijack the thread)Make sure the letter is capital/uppercase.  Also try in Edge and Chrome to see if the result is the same.Good idea.  Same issue, though.  I'm guessing it might just be that he hasn't added it into the system yet.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Quote from: frankbitcoin on December 12, 2023, 06:27:09 AMQuote from: 2stout on December 12, 2023, 06:24:18 AMMake sure the letter is capital/uppercase.  Also try in Edge and Chrome to see if the result is the same.Good idea.  Same issue, though.  I'm guessing it might just be that he hasn't added it into the system yet.Recent purchase?

comments.author: Frank AlpenCoin
comments.body: Hi,The bars are not in the database, as you have the address on the CoA (qr code).Will probably add them, and will probably do a post on bitcointalk, with all the addresses. not sure, but could be a good idea, in case the website goes down. don't know if all the addresses have to  be published on bitcointalk pros and cons . still thinking of the best solution. A pdf as satori? Sorry to pollute the thread
